name: Tour Nest
description: A all in one tourist management web application for different authorized users and smooth user experience.
keyFeatures: Three steps Authorization for Admin, Tour-Guide, Tourist
challenges: Optimizing performance for large data sets
potentialImprovements: Integrate SSLCommerz as an alternative payment gateway alongside Stripe.
Enhance the admin panel with real-time analytics.

name: Modern Hotel
description: A responsive hotel booking platform offering seamless user experience and efficient booking management.
challenges: Optimizing performance for large data sets
potentialImprovements: Add SSLCommerz payment gateway for local users.
Develop an advanced admin panel to manage bookings, customer reviews, and revenue reports.

name: VISA NAVIGATOR
description: A platform for navigating visa requirements and application processes for travelers worldwide.
challenges: Compiling accurate visa data for multiple countries
potentialImprovements: Implement SSLCommerz payment support for premium visa consultation services.
Develop an admin panel for managing visa data, updating country requirements, and analyzing user trends.

name: LINGO BINGO
description: A language-learning platform with gamified lessons to make learning engaging and fun.
challenges: Building a robust user authentication system
potentialImprovements: Introduce SSLCommerz subscription payments for premium language-learning courses.
Develop an interactive admin panel to track user progress, manage content, and analyze learning patterns.

name: GADGET HEAVEN
description: Gadget Heaven is an interactive e-commerce platform for tech enthusiasts, offering a seamless shopping experience for the latest gadgets and accessories.
keyFeatures: chat based on product's price and rating

name: PEDDY
description: Peddy is a pet-related website designed to connect pet lovers with essential services, products, and communities.
keyFeatures: You can see categories wise pets
You can see price descinding wise pets
When you press any categories of pets the button will change in another color.
When details button is press you will see a modal which has details about pets.
challenges: when you like any pet it will add in a liked section when you using mobile it will show in bottom and when in tablet or pc it is shown in right side.

when you click any of adopt button you will see a modal which has countdown from 3 and it will close automatically and after clicked the adopt button will change in adopted and the button will disabled.

name: CRICKET BUZZ
description: CricketBuzz is a dedicated platform for cricket enthusiasts, providing real-time updates, player stats, match analysis, and exclusive insights on cricketers.
keyFeatures: You can choose Players using button Choose Player and it's add in Selected section.
You can toggle between Available and Toggle button and it's color is toggle too
challenges: From selected section you can delete selected players and when you perform these operations the navbar's coin will change.
on the banner when you click Claim Free Credit button it will add 10 lakh coins in your account and show in navbar balance of coin.

name: DONATE BANGLADESH
description: CricketBuzz is a dedicated platform for cricket enthusiasts, providing real-time updates, player stats, match analysis, and exclusive insights on cricketers.
keyFeatures: You can chose your donation cart and your donation history was saved in history section.
You have blog page for some question.
